position.marginalia_text: Argentum vinu[m] coagulatum, Argyrion zotichon, Arsenicum, Anripigmentu[m], Azoch, Cain, Cambar, Caput corvi, caspachaia, Coelum, Cheseph hai, Cor Saturn, Compar, Corpus album, corpus co[n]trarium, Filius, Fumus albus, Gumma, Hermaphroditua, Hyems, Humiditas adustiua, Humiditas aquosa, Inimicus, Lapis vnus, Magnesia, Medicina vna, Medium despositinum, Menstruum, MERCVRIUS, occidens, Ollus, Ovum, Phlegma, Plu[m]bu[m], primus, Punctum, Radix, Saturnus, Secretu[m] scolia[e], senectus, Serinech, Servus fugitiuus, Socius, Spiritus, stagnum, Sublimatu[m], Succus, Sudor solis, terra residua, Ventus, Vespera, Vrina pueroru[m], Vultur, Zibach, et Ziva, ide[m] significant. &c
Natura[e] & Complexiones primaru[m] qualitatu[m], sunt quatuor, [etc.]

marginalia.translation: There are four natures and combinations of the prime qualities.
